c-0: ^You are on a set. You are the lead role in my upcoming hit movie! Are you ready?
c-1: ^You're acting. I chose you to be the lead actor in my film. Are you ready?

first: ^I don't want to be your actor. Get me out of here!
second: ^You have no choice! You will act in my movie and you will enjoy it!
third: ^Your goal in this movie is to find 6 bags of popcorn.
fourth: ^However while doing so, you will meet a friend of mine...
fifth: ^If you find all 6 bags of popcorn, you will be rewarded. If not, you will beg for mercy..
sixth: ^Lets hope you can get out of this alive...
